header.title: INVEST GOLD
header.subtitle: We are always with those who value love
header.secondSubtitle: Engagement Rings, Wedding Rings, Bracelets and Gold Chains in Kosovo

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Invest Gold Gjokaj is your premier destination for engagement rings, wedding rings, gold bracelets and gold chains in Kosovo. We create unforgettable moments with our carefully curated collection of gold jewelry, including modern engagement rings, classic wedding rings, personalized gold bracelets and quality gold chains. Each piece is expertly crafted to immortalize your special moments.

rings.title: Ring
rings.subtitle: Choose the perfect engagement or wedding ring from our curated collection. Discover unique gold bracelets and chains designed for every special moment in your life. Our gold craftsmanship ensures lasting quality and timeless style.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Discover our carefully curated collection of gold jewelry and professional services
services.seoDescription: Professional gold jewelry services in Kosovo, including engagement rings, wedding rings, gold bracelets and personalized gold chains

rings.title: Engagement Rings & Wedding Rings
rings.description: Discover our exclusive collection of engagement and wedding rings, expertly crafted from pure gold. Modern and classic designs for your most special moments.

bracelets.title: Gold Bracelets & Chains
bracelets.description: Personalized gold bracelets and bangles, crafted with exquisite detail for every style and occasion. Choose from our wide collection of unique designs.

necklaces.title: Gold Chains & Pendants
necklaces.description: Gold chains and pendants in various designs, from classic to modern. All crafted with pure gold to ensure premium quality.

custom.title: Personalized Jewelry
custom.description: We create personalized jewelry according to your preferences. From design to execution, every detail is tailored to your specifications.

repair.title: Professional Repair
repair.description: Professional repair services for all types of gold jewelry. Restorations and repairs with maximum care.

express.title: Express Service
express.description: Quick fulfillment of your orders, maintaining our highest standards of quality.

delivery.title: Home Delivery
delivery.description: Secure shipping service for your products to your doorstep.

guarantee.title: Full Guarantee
guarantee.description: We offer full guarantee for all our products, ensuring the highest standards of quality.

jewelry.description: We offer our customers the opportunity to find unique, elegant and beautiful jewelry.
jewelry.pageDescription: Discover our exclusive collection of gold chains and pendants, expertly crafted from pure gold. Modern and classic designs for your most special moments.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Invest Gold Gjokaj. By accessing and using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our website and making a purchase, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

products.title: Products
products.content: We offer high quality gold and precious metal products. While we strive to display accurate product information, we reserve the right to modify specifications without prior notice.

pricing.title: Prices and Payments
pricing.content: All prices are subject to change without notice. Prices for precious metals are based on current market rates. Payment must be made in full before order processing can begin.

orders.title: Order Processing
orders.content: Orders are subject to availability and confirmation. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including pricing errors..

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.content: We ship to select locations. Delivery times may vary based on location and product availability. All shipments are fully insured.

returns.title: Returns and Refunds
returns.content: Returns are accepted on all products. Please inspect your items upon delivery.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this website is owned by us and protected by copyright laws and intellectual property rights.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages resulting from the use of our products or services.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. The use of our website internet page continues to accept any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us through the contact information provided.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: In Invest Gold Gjokaj, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.

collection.title: Information Collected
collection.content: We collect various types of information for our services:

items.personal: Personal information (name, email, address, phone number)
items.payment: Payment information (processed securely through our payment providers)
items.usage: Usage data (how you interact with our website)

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information for the following purposes:

items.process: To process and fulfill your orders
items.improve: To improve our website and services
items.communicate: To communicate with you about our products and services

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We share your information only with authorized partners necessary to provide our services and as required by law.

cookies.title: Cookies and Consent
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience and analyze website traffic.

security.title: Security of Information
security.content: We use advanced security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, modification or disclosure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have certain rights in relation to your personal information:

items.access: Right to access your personal information
items.deletion: Right to request the deletion of your information
items.restriction: Right to restrict the processing of your information

updates.title: Updates on Privacy Policy
updates.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: If you have questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the contact information provided.

footer.description: Invest Gold Gjokaj is your trusted partner for investments in precious metals and personalized jewelry designs.
